channel.title: drupal on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in drupal on Konigi

item.title: Drupal Coda Clips
item.description: Dezinerfolio's free Drupal snippet library for the Coda editor (Mac OS only) provides a very useful set of code clips for theming Drupal sites. http://www.dezinerfolio.com/freebie/drupal-coda-clips

item.title: Better Faceted Browsing on Konigi
item.description: About 10 years ago I participated in the daily indexing of news articles as part of my job designing a digital library. During graduate study for the MLS my concentration was actually on information retrieval and classification, so I was interested in doing the job and understanding the content in order to know how to make it useful to users. Customers would get this information via the web site, by email, and in newsletters.
